briefTitle: YASU Research Registry: For Young Adults With Cancer
officialTitle: Young Adult Survivors United Cancer Research Registry
conditions: Cancer, Leukemia, Sarcoma, Germ Cell Cancer, Lymphoma, Colorectal Cancer, Melanoma, Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Cancer diagnosis received between the ages of 18 and 39.
2. Able to speak and read English

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Inability to provide consent (such as neurological illness or mental incapacity)
2. Has not registered as a member of YASU
